compatibility.notes: The CC-BY-NC-ND-3.0-IGO license prohibits derivative works and commercial use, which limits compatibility with many open-source licenses.

key_requirements: You must provide appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
You may not use the material for commercial purposes.
You may not distribute modified versions of the work.
license.name: CC-BY-NC-ND-3.0-IGO
obligations: Attribution must be given to the original creator.
The work cannot be used for commercial purposes.
No modifications or derivative works are allowed.
License must be included with any distribution of the work.
Copyright notice must be included with any distribution.
